name: Eco Spirits
blurb: Eco Spirits is an adventure RPG social game.

rewards.reward: FORUM ACCESS, NAME IN BACKER CREDITS & BACKER-ONLY PARTICIPATION EVENTS ============================== \r\nGet a special password to claim your "Backer" designation and icons for use on our forums, plus the ability to participate in Backer-only surveys and polls, and your name listed in the Backer Credits.

DIGITAL COPY OF ECO SPIRITS! ============================== A code to download the full, final version of Eco Spirits! Includes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

DIGITAL INSTRUCTION MANUAL, DIGITAL ART BOOK & DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK ============================== A digital instruction manual (English), a sweet digital art-book (English), and a digital download of our game soundtrack! \r\nIncludes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

ALL-DIGITAL REWARD SET: DIGITAL INSTRUCTION MANUAL, DIGITAL ART BOOK & DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK, EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME GOLDEN NET, EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME SPECIAL STARTER MONSTER, FORUM ACCESS, NAME IN BACKER CREDITS & BACKER-ONLY PARTICIPATION EVENTS! ============================== The above pretty much says it all!

*COMPLETE* ALL-DIGITAL REWARD SET WITH BETA ACCESS: DIGITAL COPY OF ECO SPIRITS, DIGITAL INSTRUCTION MANUAL, DIGITAL ART BOOK, DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK, EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME GOLDEN NET, EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME STARTER MONSTER, **BETA ACCESS**, FORUM ACCESS, NAME IN BACKER CREDITS & BACKER-ONLY PARTICIPATION EVENTS! ============================== The above pretty much says it all; the differences between this and the lower all-digital tier is at this level you get access to the beta version of Eco Spirits!
T-SHIRT, EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME CONTENT & BETA ACCESS ============================== A special Netfighters T-shirt. Includes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

PRINTED INSTRUCTION MANUAL & LIMITED 3 MONSTER PINS-PACK ============================== A softcover, full-color version of our instruction manual. Includes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

LIMITED ECO SPIRITS KEYCHAIN & NETFIGHTERS CAP ============================== An awesome official Netfighters Keychain and Cap. Includes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

HELP CREATE A CHALLENGE & SPECIAL POSTER & DESKTOP WALLPAPER ============================== Work with our designers to come up with a challenge for our own internal in-game achievement system that everyone can try to accomplish in the final game! Includes all previous rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

SIGNED ORIGINAL SKETCH ============================== A unique, original sketch by DOT STUDIO TEAM, along with his signature! Includes all previous non-limited rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

YOUR VOICE IN THE ENDING THEME ============================== We'll use a recording of you saying a word, phrase or sound effect to be used in the ending theme as the credits roll! Includes all previous non-limited rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

YOUR FACE IN THE GAME ============================== We'll make a 2D representation of your face to use somewhere it will fit naturally into the game -- prominent enough for you to find it and show your friends, but innocuous enough not to bother other players. Includes all previous non-limited rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

HELP DESIGN A MONSTER ============================== Video conference with our designers to collaborate on an enemy character based on your idea or design! Includes all previous non-limited rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

ORIGINAL ECO SPIRITS CONCEPT ART, 3D-PRINTED MONSTER MODEL & SPECIAL T-SHIRT ============================== An original, framed piece of concept art of one of the starter monsters, a 3D-printed model of one of those monsters, and a special limited edition T-shirt. Includes all previous non-limited rewards. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)
